actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A resolution disapproving the final recommendations of the basic route system of Amtrak proposed by the Secretary of Transportation.

summary.text: Expresses the disapproval of the House of Representatives with respect to the Secretary of Transportation's recommendations designating the basic route system of Amtrak, the National Railroad Passenger Corporation, as submitted to the Congress.

titles.title: A resolution disapproving the final recommendations of the basic route system of Amtrak proposed by the Secretary of Transportation.
